Name: OpenTelemetry
Key Features: Unified instrumentation + metrics + logs; Semantic conventions; Multi-language
Language Support: Java, Python, Go, Node.js, Rust, .NET, Ruby, PHP, Swift, Kotlin

Name: OTLP
Key Features: gRPC (binary, efficient) and HTTP (JSON/protobuf); Unified data model

Name: W3C Trace Context
Key Features: traceparent + tracestate headers; cross-vendor interoperability

Name: OpenTracing
Key Features: Span + trace model; baggage propagation; vendor-neutral
Best For: Legacy systems; migration path to OpenTelemetry

Name: OpenCensus
Key Features: Metrics + tracing; Google-led; pre-OpenTelemetry standard

Name: Jaeger
Key Features: Adaptive sampling; service maps; flexible queries; v2 native OTLP
Best For: Enterprise microservices; complex troubleshooting; attribute-based search

Name: Zipkin
Key Features: Simplicity; maturity; basic visualization; JSON-based protocol
Best For: Legacy systems; minimal infrastructure; small-scale deployments

Name: Grafana Tempo
Key Features: Object storage only; 10-100x cheaper; 100% sampling; Grafana integration

Name: SigNoz
Key Features: OTel-native; traces + metrics + logs; simple deployment; developer-friendly

Name: SkyWalking
Key Features: Auto-instrumentation; APM-focused; eBPF integration; large-scale

Name: Uptrace
Key Features: Developer-friendly UI; simple setup; OTel-native; good docs
Best For: Quick onboarding; small-to-medium teams; developer experience

Name: Datadog APM
Key Features: AI-driven insights; full-stack integration; service maps

Name: New Relic APM
Key Features: Full-stack observability; APM analytics; multi-cloud

Name: Elastic APM
Key Features: Elasticsearch integration; traces + metrics + logs; ML-powered

Name: Honeycomb
Key Features: High-speed querying; incident response focus; BubbleUp

Name: Dash0
Key Features: AI/ML insights; low-overhead; ranked top 2025

Name: Google Cloud Trace
Key Features: GCP integration; Cloud Run + GKE auto-instrumentation; SLO monitoring

Name: AWS X-Ray
Key Features: AWS service integration; service maps; local caching

Name: Dynatrace
Key Features: PurePath tracing; AI (Davis engine); auto-instrumentation; hybrid-cloud

Name: IBM Instana
Key Features: AI anomaly detection; dependency maps; hybrid environments

Name: Grafana Cloud Tempo
Key Features: Managed Tempo in cloud; integrated with metrics/logs; cost-optimized

Name: OpenTelemetry Collector
Key Features: Receives, processes, exports telemetry; sampling; filtering; batching

Name: Prometheus
Key Features: Time-series metrics; exemplar support linking to traces

Name: Grafana Loki
Key Features: Log aggregation; trace ID extraction; integration with Tempo/Prometheus

Name: VictoriaLogs
Key Features: High-performance logging; log-based tracing; trace ID linking
